name: Agile Maneuvers

sections.body: You add your Dexterity bonus to your base attack bonus and size bonus when determining your Combat Maneuver Bonus (see Combat) instead of your Strength bonus.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You add your Strength bonus to your base attack bonus and size bonus when determining your Combat Maneuver Bonus.
sections.name: Normal

description: You've learned to use your quickness in place of brute force when performing combat maneuvers.
